name: candy cruise fever
description:
Description
Join the fun world of Candy Cruise and help her to collect the candy and many more!

Match three or more same color of candy to clear the level and win free gifts! Try out this awesome game. It is similar to candy crush, but different character will make it more fun.

Be careful! You need to finish task in limited steps. Boosters help! You have BBQ shovel, Bombs, Color Board and the Cruet. Each one has amazing tool in the adventure!

New features:
NEW LEVELS updated, Add to Lev.200.
NEW trip updated!
